name: HSP_BKT_SPLIT_EOB_INFO
description: This table contains information about payment split EOBs.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The hospital billing bucket ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_PMT_TX_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB payment ID.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The payment split EOB post date.

columns.name: DEPOSIT_DATE
columns.description: The payment split EOB deposit date.

columns.name: ORIG_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB original hospital billing bucket ID.

columns.name: PMT_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB payer ID.

columns.name: BUCKET_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB hospital billing bucket payer ID.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB coverage ID.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The payment split EOB invoice number.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: The payment split EOB image database ID.

columns.name: ICN
columns.description: The payment split EOB internal control number (ICN).

columns.name: PMT_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB payment amount.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB allowed amount.

columns.name: NOT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB not allowed amount.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB deductible amount.

columns.name: COINS_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB coinsurance amount.

columns.name: COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB copay amount.

columns.name: COB_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB COB amount.

columns.name: ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB adjustment amount.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB non-covered amount.

columns.name: INCLUDE_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB include adjustment amount.

columns.name: EXCLUDE_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB exclude adjustment amount.

columns.name: IGNORE_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The payment split EOB ignore adjustment amount.
